meanings.sent1: The communicatees listened attentively to the speaker.
meanings.sent2: The teacher shared important information with the communicatees.
meanings.sent3: The communicatees were thrilled to hear the good news.
meanings.sent4: The communicatees were like sponges, absorbing every word.
meanings.sent5: The communicatees eagerly awaited the message.

meanings.definition: communicatees: the recipients of a message or information
meanings.sent1: The communicatees understood the instructions clearly.
meanings.sent2: The email was sent to all the communicatees in the group.
meanings.sent3: The communicatees were surprised by the unexpected announcement.
meanings.sent4: The communicatees were like puzzle pieces fitting the information together.
meanings.sent5: The communicatees eagerly awaited the message from their boss.
